name: gnotifier
author: Michal Kosciesza <michal@mkiol.net>
title: GNotifier
description: Replaces built-in notifications with the OS native notifications. It works on Linux and Windows 10.

preferences.name: engine
preferences.title: Notification engine
preferences.description: Defines how notification will be displayed. Possible options are: built-in engine (Standard), OS native engine (GNotifier) or Custom shell command (Custom command).

preferences.name: command
preferences.title: Custom command
preferences.description: Defines custom shell command that will be executed. This option is applicable only if engine option is set to 'Custom' value. Note that notification title, text or image you can pass to command with following variables: %title, %text, %image.

preferences.name: notifyIcon
preferences.title: Notification Icon
preferences.description: Icon used for download complete and new message notifications. It can be either icon URL or name. Examples: "file://c:\my-cool-icon.png", "nightly", "aurora" or "gnotifier". If value is set to "default" then icon will be set based on application name (e.g. Firefox, Thunderbird, SeaMonkey).

preferences.name: timeout
preferences.title: Notification timeout (Linux only)
preferences.description: Sets the timeout of the notification in seconds. To set the default time, pass "0" value. Note that the timeout may be ignored by some servers.

preferences.name: timeoutExpire
preferences.title: Notification expiration (Linux only)
preferences.description: Sets the notification to expire after defined timeout (true) or to never expire (false). Note that it may be ignored by some servers.

preferences.name: downloadCompleteAlert
preferences.title: Download complete notification
preferences.description: If enabled, download complete notification will be shown everytime when downloading is finished.

preferences.name: clickOption
preferences.title: Download complete notification - Default click action
preferences.description: Defines default action for 'click' on download complete notification.

preferences.name: excludedExtensionsList
preferences.title: Download complete notification - List of excluded file extensions
preferences.description: Comma separated list of filename extensions that will not trigger download complete notification. Example: "html, js, jpg".

preferences.name: maxDLbuffer
preferences.title: Download complete notification - Maximum number of simultaneous notifications
preferences.description: Defines the maximum number of simultaneous notifications. For instance, "5" means that if you download less or equal 5 files at once, all will trigger individual notification, but if you download more than 6 files at once, only 1 multiple notification will be shown. Set to "0" to disable aggregation.

preferences.name: enableRSS
preferences.title: New message notification - RSS feeds
preferences.description: If enabled, new message notification for RSS items will be displayed.

preferences.name: maxMessageBuffer
preferences.title: New message notification - Maximum number of simultaneous notifications
preferences.description: Defines the maximum number of simultaneous notifications for new messages. For instance, "5" means that if you receive less or equal 5 messages at once, all will trigger individual notification, but if you receive more than 6 new messages at once, only 1 multiple messages notification will be shown. Set to "0" to disable aggregation.

preferences.name: newMailOpen
preferences.title: New message notification - Open action
preferences.description: Defines how new messages should be opened when you click on notification.

preferences.name: clickOptionNewEmail
preferences.title: New message notification - Default click action
preferences.description: Defines default action for 'click' on new message notification.

preferences.name: aggregatedClickOption
preferences.title: New message notification - Default click action for multiple messages notification
preferences.description: Defines default action for 'click' on multiple messages notification.

preferences.name: emailTitleFormat
preferences.title: New message notification - Title
preferences.description: %s: Subject, %a: Sender (Name <E-mail>), %m: Sender E-mail, %n: Sender Name, %f: Folder, %v: Server, %k: Size, %u: Account, %b: Body excerpt, %c: Number of unread messages, %%: %

preferences.name: emailTextFormat
preferences.title: New message notification - Text
preferences.description: %s: Subject, %a: Sender (Name <E-mail>), %m: Sender E-mail, %n: Sender Name, %f: Folder, %v: Server, %k: Size, %u: Account, %b: Body excerpt, %c: Number of unread messages, %%: %, \n: Newline

preferences.name: aggregatedEmailTitleFormat
preferences.title: New message notification - Title for multiple messages notification
preferences.description: %C: Count of new messages, %c: Number of unread messages, %%: %

preferences.name: aggregatedEmailTextFormat
preferences.title: New message notification - Text for multiple messages notification
preferences.description: %[format]{n}: Format definition (the same as in "Text for message notification") for "n" first emails, %C: Count of new messages, %c: Number of unread messages, %%: %, \n: Newline

preferences.name: foldersAllowedList
preferences.title: New message notification - List of folders to allow notifications from
preferences.description: Comma seperated list of folder names (or account name, folder name pairs). For example:  "My email|Inbox, My folder" will only allow notifications from "Inbox" folder under "My email" account and from any folder with name "My folder". Set to blank to allow all.

preferences.name: test
preferences.title: New message notification - Test
preferences.label: Test
preferences.description: Select a message from any folder, then come back and click on 'Test'

preferences.name: testAggregated
preferences.title: New message notification - Test multiple messages notification
preferences.label: Test
preferences.description: Select a message from any folder, then come back and click on 'Test'

preferences.name: close
preferences.title: Close all notifications (Linux only)
preferences.label: Close notifications
preferences.description: Close all active notifications
